name: Lunar Lander [Recreation]
description:
Portfolio Website: http://travisenglandhewlett.wordpress.com

Second Engines Project, FDSC Games Design & Development Level 4 

Developed from: 1st February – 4th June 2021 

Developed by: Travis England-Hewlett 

This recreation of the original Lunar Lander game was developed in a 3-dimensional map, however the player still perceives the game from the legacy 2-dimensional perspective. You as the player use directional controls to rotate the ship and apply thrust in the direction of rotation; In order to land precisely and accumulate as many points as possible. My recreation of said game in 3-dimensional space was a result of preference and my inexperience with 2D game development.

Sourced Audio: 

Effects: BootstrapMade, 2006. SoundBible. [online] Soundbible. Available at: https://soundbible.com [Accessed 11 May 2021].
